name: Celestial Messenger
originalText:
Flash (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Celestial Messenger gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Yanling planeswalker.

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Celestial Messenger may become lethal if your Yanling planeswalker leaves the battlefield during that turn.
